lead_paragraph: Sri Lanka's World Twenty20 title defence suffered a jolt on the day the tournament gets underway with Lasith Malinga's slow recovery from a knee injury forcing the fast bowler to hand over captaincy to Angelo Mathews.

headline.print_headline: Malinga Steps Down as Lanka Captain for World T20
headline.main: Malinga Steps Down as Lanka Captain for World T20

snippet: Sri Lanka's World Twenty20 title defence suffered a jolt on the day the tournament gets underway with Lasith Malinga's slow recovery from a knee injury forcing the fast bowler to hand over captaincy to Angelo Mathews....
